title: How to Make a Rose Out of a Tomato

steps.headline: Start off by peeling from the bottom part of the tomato, as shown in the picture.
Continue to peel, just like you would do with an apple.
Make a spiral shape out of the peel.
steps.description: It is extremely important to peel with the same force. Do not force the knife to pop too much. The greater care you take with this task, the more regular and fine your rose will be. Proceed as delicately as you can, and try not to break the peel spiral.

steps.headline: When you're finished with the peeling, use the rest of the tomato in a salad.
steps.description: Or, you can even use it to cook with.

steps.headline: Form the rose.
steps.description: To make the rose, you can either start from the bottom of the peel, or from the top. Try to follow the natural shape of the tomato.

steps.headline: Starting from your chosen end point, fold the peel into a triangular form.
After the triangle is created, start working with the petals of the tomato.
steps.description: You have to fold the peel over itself. Try not to force too hard or you will break the spiral.

steps.headline: While folding, leave some space in between for the rose to get a softer look.
steps.description: Keep rolling until you are done with the peel completely.

steps.headline: Now when you arrive at the end of the peel, you can use the part as the base of the rose.
Now you are done with the rose, however if you wish, you can tighten or soften the shape of the rose as you desire.

text: Start off by peeling from the bottom part of the tomato, as shown in the picture.  Continue to peel, just like you would do with an apple.  Make a spiral shape out of the peel. It is extremely important to peel with the same force. Do not force the knife to pop too much. The greater care you take with this task, the more regular and fine your rose will be. Proceed as delicately as you can, and try not to break the peel spiral. When you're finished with the peeling, use the rest of the tomato in a salad. Or, you can even use it to cook with. Form the rose. To make the rose, you can either start from the bottom of the peel, or from the top. Try to follow the natural shape of the tomato. Starting from your chosen end point, fold the peel into a triangular form.  After the triangle is created, start working with the petals of the tomato. You have to fold the peel over itself. Try not to force too hard or you will break the spiral. While folding, leave some space in between for the rose to get a softer look. Keep rolling until you are done with the peel completely. Now when you arrive at the end of the peel, you can use the part as the base of the rose.  Now you are done with the rose, however if you wish, you can tighten or soften the shape of the rose as you desire.
